attributes.action: To stop the waste of public money .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The present Liberal Democrat controlled Cornwall County Council are to spend a quoted £500,000 on a New Logo for the New Unitary Council which is a waste of public money, the present one holds many years of History and is known throughout the world. Hence no need for this great expense. PLEASE INTERVEANE

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
